front: Why does it make sense to use the navigation API or SAPUI5 and concepts such as eventbus or the navcontainer functions of the base application?
back: The API encures that the user of the app is able to store bookmarks for navigation targets, clearly seperates the navigation routes from application implementation

front: From which control does the sap.m.App control inherit navigation capabilities?

back: pages, pages aggregations works as container for visual aspects like views, pages, or carousels

front: When is the master-detail pattern not recommended?
back: when you have to implement app wher user is able to apply complex filters on data in masterlist,or when user is able to display data in different facets such as charts and forms

sap.m.SplitAppMode where master is automatically hidden in portriat mode

sap.m.SplitAppMode where master is shown inside a popover when in portriat mode

front: What are the different content densities provided by SAPUI5?
Content Density factor: Displays controls with dimensions large enough to enable fingertip interaction, idead for touch devices
Content Density factor: Reduces the dimensions of the controls, allowing more information to be displayed on the UI, ideal for devices operated by mouse and keyboard
What is the best approach to showing a UI control on a desktop only, and not on a mobile device?

You want to define a property with the name width to enhance a standard UI5 control. The property should hold the current width of the UI control. What is the best approach to dfining the type of such a property?
back: Define the property width of the type sap.ui.core.CSSSize

front: Which function must be called inside a control renderer to add the control ID to the DOM tree and support eventing?

front: What type of concurrency control is offered by OData?

back: The OData Model fetches the token while reading the metadata and sends the token automatically in each write request header.

back: The delivered standard application remains unchanged, hence the extension is considered to be modification free

front: Is it possible to add an extension point in the component implementation?
back: No, Extension points are only supported in views.

back: After the corresponding functions from the standard controller

back: Returns a project back to the previous state

front: What is the result of a GIT revert?

back: A GIT Branch represents an independent line of development.

front: When creating a CDS view, the SQL view name and view name for CDS must be identical

back: Declare an association using 'association to' statement, Expose the association by writing its name in projection list

front: What are the limitations of publishing CDS as OData service by adding a @OData.publish:true
back: Cannot Change names of entity sets, Only 1 level is taken into consideration when exposing associations, No customized ABAP code in SAP Gateway

front: In which cases, is a local annotation better than a CDS annotation?
back: Complex UI relevant annotations, You want to use annotations which are not supported by your current ABAP version

What steps needs to be done in manifest.json if you need to hide variant function in a list report?
back: Add setting to enable smart Variant Management, Set setting variantManagementHidden to True

front: How do you set a field as the title for a business entity?
back: Add @UI.headerInfo.title.value for the CDS view and reference it to the field

front: Which types are supported as header facets for an object page?

front: To add a header facet, you should use @UI.HeaderFacet annotation and put it before the define statement of your CDS View

back: Create a Header Facet, Create a collection facet which is displayed as section, Create a reference under collection facet

front: Which of the following properties are relevant to the type of facet?

front: What are the options for external navigation?
back: Navigation to URL(As a Link), Navigation to intent(As a Link), Navigation to Intent(As a Button)

front: What can you do by editing manifest.json?

options.B: Add object pages as sub page under an object page

front: The field indicate criticality should be hidden because it means nothing to end user
What steps aer used to display a field as a rating indicator?
back: Set type of line item #AS_DATAPOINT, add a @UI.datapoint to the field and set visualization to #RATING

front: What are the differences between analytical entity set and normal entity set from an OData consumer perspective?
back: Analytical Entity Set: Generates a new field for primary key, returns all data needed to analyze client, analyzes the use of the database and runs faster when SAP HANA is used as database compared to a normal entity set

front: SAP Fiori elements support write operations, if the back end service is written by CDS working with BOPF

Which of the following layouts, are described in version 1.48 of the Guidelines?
What aspects should be considered in deciding which layout template to use?
back: When deciding which template to use for your app, you need to consider what the user wants to achieve when working in the app, it is helpful to answer questions on the nature of the tasks

front: Which types of application can use the dynamic page layout?
back: You can use the dynamic page layout for any kind of application

front: When should you not use the dynamic page layout?
back: You are planning to use SAP fiori elements, such as the list report, analytical list page, overview page, or object page, which already incorporates the dynamic page layout. You want to implement an initial page or object page floor plan these floor plans already incorporate snapping header and footer toolbar features, the behavior is comparable to the dynamic page behavior, but the technical foundation is different. You only need to display a small amount of information, in this case use a dialog instead, if you cannot avoid using the dynamic page layout, use letterboxing to mitigate the issue.

front: When do you use the flexible-column layout?
back: You want to create a master-detail or mater-detail-detail scenario in which the user can drill down or navigate.

front: How many columns are supported by the flexible-column layout?
What is a SAP Fiori floorplan?
back: A floorplan is a UI pattern that provides consistent UX

front: When do you have to implement the SAP Fiori floorplan Initial page
back: The initial page floorplan is used when the user needs to navigate to a single object.

front: What SAPUI5 control is used as a starting point to implement the initial page?
What problem is solved by the list report floorplan?
back: You want to display a large collection of items and the user can take some action.

front: What problem is solved by the object page floorplan?
back: You want to display all the information of a simple or complex object with diffent facets in a responsive way

front: What problem is sovled by the worklist report floorplan?
back: You want to display a collection of items and process them or delegate them to someone else

front: What problem is solved by the wizard floorplan?
back: The user must process a long and unfamilar task

front: What is the nature of the overview page floorplan?
back: You want to show all information that is needed by the user on a single page, based on a user specific domain or role.

front: When do you not use the overview page floorplan?
back: A high-level or birds-eye view of an application content is sufficient. You want to show information about one object only, in this case use the object page instead. You just represent one application and less than three cards.

front: What UI control can be used to define a hook to exten an application?
What ways are there of extending or modifying a SAPUI5 view?
back: View Extension, View Replacement, View Modificaiton

front: What is the goal of every developer?
back: Increase Efficiency, Develop Faster, Less Maintenance

back: No value help dialog, Supports fuzzy search, Finda a keyword in multiply fields
